TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StemmerTokenFilter extends Microsoft.Azure.Search.Models.TokenFilter

Docs.summary: Language specific stemming filter. This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the StemmerTokenFilter class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, valuetype Microsoft.Azure.Search.Models.StemmerTokenFilterLanguage language) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the token filter. It must only contain letters, digits, spaces, dashes or underscores, can only start and end with alphanumeric characters, and is limited to 128 characters.

The language to use. Possible values include: 'arabic', 'armenian', 'basque', 'brazilian', 'bulgarian', 'catalan', 'czech', 'danish', 'dutch', 'dutchKp', 'english', 'lightEnglish', 'minimalEnglish', 'possessiveEnglish', 'porter2', 'lovins', 'finnish', 'lightFinnish', 'french', 'lightFrench', 'minimalFrench', 'galician', 'minimalGalician', 'german', 'german2', 'lightGerman', 'minimalGerman', 'greek', 'hindi', 'hungarian', 'lightHungarian', 'indonesian', 'irish', 'italian', 'lightItalian', 'sorani', 'latvian', 'norwegian', 'lightNorwegian', 'minimalNorwegian', 'lightNynorsk', 'minimalNynorsk', 'portuguese', 'lightPortuguese', 'minimalPortuguese', 'portugueseRslp', 'romanian', 'russian', 'lightRussian', 'spanish', 'lightSpanish', 'swedish', 'lightSwedish', 'turkish'
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the StemmerTokenFilter class.

Gets or sets the language to use. Possible values include: 'arabic', 'armenian', 'basque', 'brazilian', 'bulgarian', 'catalan', 'czech', 'danish', 'dutch', 'dutchKp', 'english', 'lightEnglish', 'minimalEnglish', 'possessiveEnglish', 'porter2', 'lovins', 'finnish', 'lightFinnish', 'french', 'lightFrench', 'minimalFrench', 'galician', 'minimalGalician', 'german', 'german2', 'lightGerman', 'minimalGerman', 'greek', 'hindi', 'hungarian', 'lightHungarian', 'indonesian', 'irish', 'italian', 'lightItalian', 'sorani', 'latvian', 'norwegian', 'lightNorwegian', 'minimalNorwegian', 'lightNynorsk', 'minimalNynorsk', 'portuguese', 'lightPortuguese', 'minimalPortuguese', 'portugueseRslp', 'romanian', 'russian', 'lightRussian', 'spanish', 'lightSpanish', 'swedish', 'lightSwedish', 'turkish'
